original_text: Then Jephthah fled from his brothers and lived in the land of Tob, and worthless fellows collected around Jephthah and went out with him.
korean_text: 이에 입다가 그의 형제들을 피하여 돕 땅에 거주하매 잡류가 그에게로 모여 와서 그와 함께 출입하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then Jephthah fled from his brothers
and lived in the land of Tob
and worthless fellows collected around Jephthah
